title: A Bicyclops Built for Two
desc: Leela meets Alkazar, who claims to be the only other remaining cyclops in the universe. But when Alcazar invites Leela back to his home planet and treats her like a slave, Fry suspects that something is amiss. He tells Leela that Alkazar is actually a jerk, which forces Leela to decide between being happy and saving the Cyclops race
